summary: Supply chain executive with over 15 years of experience in pharma logistics, achieved $58.5M USD in efficiencies.

bullets.text: Designed the restructuring process for regionalization, optimizing resource allocation for multi-regional operations, resulting in a 15% increase in operational efficiency.
Led procurement redesign, achieving a 25% cost reduction in the first year by customizing processes for business units.
Oversaw operations for Argentina, Paraguay, Uruguay, Chile, and Bolivia, enhancing customer service processes regionally, improving customer satisfaction by 20%.
Implemented 'Open+' methodology, generating $12.5M USD in productivity improvements across regional distribution centers.
Reduced finished product days of inventory from 45 to 15, impacting P&L with a $75M USD reduction.
Drove $58.5M USD in productivities by leading execution of high-impact projects.
Transitioned from S&OP to IBP methodology, improving supply chain visibility and decision-making.
Achieved 75% diversification of imported materials amidst the SIRAs situation, boosting local sourcing.
Led cross-functional teams to align production with LATAM demand, ensuring optimal resource utilization.
Integrated ComEx with Order to Cash, improving process efficiency and reducing operational redundancies.
Delivered a $2.7M EUR reduction in raw material costs during the pandemic, freeing cash flow.

Expanded company presence in the food industry, increasing temperature-controlled shipments by 32% through tier 2 customers.
Secured two tier 1 pharma tenders, establishing oversight over key operational activities.
Achieved a 98% Customer Service Level across LATAM by refining planning processes.
Implemented SAP APO transition from Manugistics, improving planning accuracy.
Reduced days of stock from 80 to 65, capturing $5.4M in working capital.

Improved forecast accuracy from 45% to 85%, using robust analytics and KPI dashboard.
Launched 28 new products through an efficient and timely go-to-market strategy.
Enhanced Forecast Accuracy from 98% to 99.3%, contributing to a 99.7% CSL.
Facilitated local production shift for 25 imported products amid DJAI impact.
